----- Original Message -----
From: Drew Silsby
To: Enchanter
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 2:57 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] More Researching info!


Greetings all,
I have just been talking to a fellow Enchanter and this is what he had to tell me:

Tassarin's Grimoire holds Enchanter's spells for research.
Page 23 (left and right halves) contain the spell LEVITATE!
Page 30 (left and right halves) contain the spell BERSERKER STRENGTH!

Good luck finding these pages!

Fren
Gnome, Enchanter
Tunare Server
